title: Part B

descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer and/or a valid justification.

  • Step 1 is the rate-determining step. The rate law of elementary step 1 is rate = k [N 2 O 5 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49CD@ , which is consistent with the first order kinetics of the overall rate law.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer.

  • Remain the same. The rate constant, k, is independent of concentration and will remain the same at constant temperature.

The response provides the correct answer.
